name: Bhapa Chingri
description: Steamed prawns marinated in a flavorful blend of mustard paste, coconut, and spices, a delicacy from Bengal.

name: Shorshe Ilish
description: A traditional Bengali dish made with Hilsa fish marinated in mustard paste and cooked to perfection.

name: Kosha Mangsho
description: Slow-cooked mutton curry flavored with a blend of spices and served with rice or paratha, a Bengali favorite.

name: Aloo Posto
description: A comforting Bengali dish made with potatoes cooked in a poppy seed paste, mustard oil, and spices.

name: Payesh
description: A traditional Bengali rice pudding made with rice, milk, sugar, and flavored with cardamom and nuts.

name: Biryani
description: A fragrant rice dish cooked with tender meat, aromatic spices, and herbs, a popular favorite in Bengali cuisine.
